long_description: Dependable and comfortable, Union Force snowboard bindings provide park-to-peak proficiency so you can easily transition from sliding rails to ripping big turns in deep snow. Stage IV bases are made wth high-quality DuPont(TM) Zytel(R) ST nylon; they're strong, supportive and secure, and balance comfort and response. Baseplates are designed to be supremely strong with the smallest footprint possible; this promotes free, even board flex for sweet response, board control and durability. Injected dual-density EVA bushings damp vibrations underfoot, promoting a comfortable ride and smooth, even board flex with no dead spots. Extruded aluminum heel cups undergo an anodizing process that further increases their strength by 30%; they'll maintain their shape no matter how much wear and tear they see. Multizone highbacks offer three different zones of flex for a transitional top-to-bottom flex, with the top third being the softest and the bottom third the stiffest. 3D Direct-Connect ankle straps eliminate elasticity and evenly distribute pressure across feet and ankles for increased comfort and board control. Multi-position toe straps fit a wide range of boots; magnesium buckles are 4 times stronger than aluminum with only half the weight. Union Force bindings are compatible with Burton The Channel M6 snowboards.
short_description: Dependable and comfortable, Union Force snowboard bindings provide park-to-peak proficiency so you can easily transition from sliding rails to ripping big turns in deep snow.
